item.title: Why China Isn’t Lecturing Trump About His Costly Bill
item.description: Beijing has a history of warning Washington about the safety of its Treasury holdings. This time it may have reasons to stay silent, at least publicly...

item.title: From Cooking on TV to Feeding the Front Line in Ukraine
item.description: This chef appeared on TV before joining the army when Russia invaded in 2022. Now he makes his borscht for troops instead of cooking show judges.

item.description: Indonesia’s president promised free meals for every student in the country. But unemployment is rising, and some analysts say he’s making matters wors...
